storyTitle: As Risk Analyst, I want to capture applicant risk factors to achieve precise risk profiling

testCases.title: Validate risk factor data submission with complete inputs
preconditions: User is logged in with Risk Analyst role
Applicant profile exists in the system
ApplicantRiskFactors table is accessible
Quoting engine integration is active
Network connectivity is stable

steps.action: Navigate to the risk factors input section from the applicant profile page
steps.expectedResult: Risk factors input page loads successfully within 2 seconds. All relevant risk categories are displayed based on applicant profile. Mandatory fields are clearly marked with asterisks. Input fields are enabled and ready for data entry

steps.action: Enter valid risk factor data in all mandatory fields including risk category selection, risk severity level, risk description, and any profile-specific required fields
steps.expectedResult: All inputs are accepted without validation errors. Real-time validation shows green checkmarks or success indicators next to completed fields. No error messages are displayed. Character limits and format requirements are respected

steps.action: Click the Submit button to save the risk factor data
steps.expectedResult: System displays a success message confirming data has been saved. Risk factor data is successfully integrated with the quoting engine. Response time is under 2 seconds. User is redirected to confirmation page or applicant summary showing updated risk profile

postconditions: Risk factor data is persisted in ApplicantRiskFactors table
Quoting engine has received and processed the risk data
Applicant risk profile is updated
Audit log entry is created for the submission
Risk data status is set to 'Submitted'

testCases.title: Verify rejection of incomplete risk factor data submission
preconditions: User is logged in with Risk Analyst role
Applicant profile exists in the system
ApplicantRiskFactors table is accessible
Validation rules are configured and active
Network connectivity is stable

steps.action: Navigate to the risk factors input section from the applicant profile page
steps.expectedResult: Risk factors input page loads successfully. All relevant risk categories and input fields are displayed. Mandatory fields are clearly marked with asterisks or required indicators

steps.action: Leave one or more mandatory risk factor fields empty (such as risk category, severity level, or description) and optionally fill some non-mandatory fields
steps.expectedResult: Real-time validation highlights the missing mandatory fields with red borders or warning icons. Inline error messages appear below empty required fields indicating 'This field is required'. Submit button may be disabled or show warning state

steps.action: Attempt to submit the incomplete risk factor data by clicking the Submit button
steps.expectedResult: Submission is blocked and prevented. Clear error message is displayed at the top of the form stating 'Please complete all required fields before submitting'. All incomplete mandatory fields are highlighted in red. Focus is moved to the first incomplete field. No data is saved to the database. User remains on the input page

postconditions: No data is saved to ApplicantRiskFactors table
No integration call is made to quoting engine
User remains on the risk factors input page
Form retains any valid data entered
Error state is clearly visible to the user

testCases.title: Test addition of custom risk factor details
preconditions: User is logged in with Risk Analyst role
Applicant profile exists in the system
ApplicantRiskFactors table supports custom fields
Custom risk factor feature is enabled
Quoting engine can process custom risk factors

steps.action: Navigate to the risk factors input section from the applicant profile page
steps.expectedResult: Risk factors input page loads successfully. Standard risk categories and input fields are displayed. An 'Add Custom Risk Factor' button or link is visible and enabled

steps.action: Click on 'Add Custom Risk Factor' button and enter custom risk factor details including custom category name, description, severity level, and any additional notes
steps.expectedResult: Custom risk factor input fields appear dynamically. All custom inputs are accepted with appropriate validation (character limits, required fields). Real-time validation confirms valid entries. Custom risk factor is added to the form display. Option to add multiple custom factors is available

steps.action: Complete all mandatory standard risk factor fields and click Submit button to save all data including custom risk factors
steps.expectedResult: System displays success message confirming all data including custom risk factors has been saved. Custom risk factors are successfully integrated with the quoting engine. Response time is under 2 seconds. Confirmation page shows both standard and custom risk factors. Risk profile reflects all captured data

postconditions: All risk factor data including custom entries is persisted in ApplicantRiskFactors table
Custom risk factors are properly tagged and identifiable
Quoting engine has processed both standard and custom risk data
Applicant risk profile includes custom risk factors
Audit log captures custom risk factor additions

storyTitle: As Risk Analyst, I want to review and validate captured risk factors to achieve data quality assurance

testCases.title: Validate risk factor review dashboard displays data correctly
preconditions: User is logged in with Risk Analyst role and review permissions
Risk factor data has been submitted and is pending review
ApplicantRiskFactors table contains reviewable records
Review dashboard API endpoints are accessible
Network connectivity is stable

steps.action: Login to the system using Risk Analyst credentials and navigate to the risk factor review dashboard from the main menu
steps.expectedResult: Review dashboard loads within 3 seconds. Dashboard displays all captured risk factors pending review in a structured table or card format. Each entry shows applicant name, submission date, risk categories, and review status. Data is accurate and matches submitted information. Filtering and sorting options are available

steps.action: Review the displayed risk factor data and identify any missing or inconsistent data entries by examining completeness and logical consistency
steps.expectedResult: System automatically highlights issues with visual indicators (red flags, warning icons, or colored backgrounds). Missing mandatory fields are clearly marked. Inconsistent data (logical conflicts, out-of-range values) is flagged with specific issue descriptions. Tooltip or detail panel explains each validation issue. Issue summary count is displayed

steps.action: Select a risk factor entry with issues, enter correction request comments in the provided text field, and click 'Request Corrections' button
steps.expectedResult: Correction request is submitted successfully. Confirmation message appears stating 'Correction request sent successfully'. Risk data status is updated to 'Correction Requested'. Comments are saved and associated with the record. Notification is triggered to the data submitter. Dashboard refreshes to show updated status. Timestamp of correction request is recorded

postconditions: Risk factor status is updated to 'Correction Requested' in database
Correction comments are stored and linked to the record
Notification is sent to appropriate stakeholders
Audit trail captures the review action
Dashboard reflects the updated status

testCases.title: Verify access control restricts non-analyst users
preconditions: Test user account exists without Risk Analyst role (e.g., Sales Agent, Administrator, or other role)
Role-based access control is configured and active
Review dashboard and APIs have proper security settings
Authentication system is functioning
Network connectivity is stable

steps.action: Login to the system using credentials of a non-Risk Analyst user and attempt to navigate to the risk factor review dashboard via direct URL or menu access
steps.expectedResult: Access to the review dashboard is denied. User is redirected to an access denied page or unauthorized error page (HTTP 403). Clear error message is displayed stating 'You do not have permission to access this resource' or similar. Review dashboard content is not visible. Navigation menu does not show review dashboard option for unauthorized roles

steps.action: Attempt to directly access review API endpoints (GET /api/applicants/riskfactors/review) using API testing tool or browser with non-analyst user session token
steps.expectedResult: API request is rejected with HTTP 403 Forbidden status code. Response body contains appropriate error message indicating insufficient permissions. No risk factor data is returned in the response. Security headers are properly set. Attempt is logged in security audit log

postconditions: No unauthorized access to risk factor review data occurred
Security audit log contains entry of unauthorized access attempt
User session remains valid but restricted to authorized functions
No data breach or exposure occurred
System security integrity is maintained

testCases.title: Test approval of risk factor data
preconditions: User is logged in with Risk Analyst role and approval permissions
Risk factor data has been submitted and is pending review
Risk data is complete and passes all validation checks
ApplicantRiskFactors table contains reviewable records
Approval API endpoint is accessible

steps.action: Login to the system as Risk Analyst and navigate to the review dashboard, then select a risk factor record that is complete and valid for review
steps.expectedResult: Review dashboard displays successfully within 3 seconds. Risk factor data is displayed accurately with all captured details visible. Data shows no validation issues or missing fields. Review options including 'Approve' and 'Request Corrections' buttons are enabled and visible. Record details are complete and consistent

steps.action: Review all risk factor details for accuracy and completeness, then click the 'Approve' button to approve the risk data
steps.expectedResult: Approval confirmation dialog appears asking 'Are you sure you want to approve this risk data?'. Upon confirmation, system processes the approval request. Success message is displayed stating 'Risk data approved successfully'. Risk data status is updated to 'Approved' in real-time. Approval timestamp and analyst name are recorded. Confirmation notification is shown on screen. Dashboard refreshes to reflect the approved status

postconditions: Risk factor status is updated to 'Approved' in ApplicantRiskFactors table
Approval timestamp and approver details are recorded
Approved data is available for underwriting and quoting processes
Notification is sent to relevant stakeholders
Audit log entry is created documenting the approval
Record moves out of pending review queue

storyTitle: As Risk Analyst, I want to generate risk factor summary reports to achieve informed decision making

testCases.title: Validate generation of risk factor summary report with filters
preconditions: User is logged in as a Risk Analyst with valid credentials
Risk report module is accessible and functional
ApplicantRiskFactors table contains test data with various risk levels, dates, and statuses
System is under normal load conditions
PDF and Excel export functionality is enabled

steps.action: Navigate to the risk report module from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Risk report module page loads successfully and displays filter options

steps.action: Select date range filter (e.g., last 30 days) from the date picker
steps.expectedResult: Date range is selected and displayed in the filter section

steps.action: Select risk level filter (e.g., High, Medium)
steps.expectedResult: Risk level filter is applied and displayed in the active filters section

steps.action: Select status filter (e.g., Active, Pending)
steps.expectedResult: Status filter is applied and displayed in the active filters section

steps.action: Click on 'Generate Report' button
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request and generates the report within 5 seconds, displaying a loading indicator during generation

steps.action: Review the generated report data including applicant names, risk categories, risk levels, and dates
steps.expectedResult: Report displays only data matching the selected filters (date range: last 30 days, risk levels: High and Medium, status: Active and Pending)

steps.action: Verify that risk factors are properly aggregated by applicant and category
steps.expectedResult: Report shows correct aggregation with no duplicate entries and proper categorization

steps.action: Click on 'Export to PDF' button
steps.expectedResult: PDF file downloads successfully with filename containing report name and timestamp

steps.action: Open the downloaded PDF file
steps.expectedResult: PDF opens successfully, is readable, contains all report data with proper formatting, headers, and footers

steps.action: Return to the report page and click on 'Export to Excel' button
steps.expectedResult: Excel file downloads successfully with filename containing report name and timestamp

steps.action: Open the downloaded Excel file
steps.expectedResult: Excel file opens successfully, is readable, contains all report data in structured columns with proper headers and formatting

postconditions: Risk factor summary report is generated and displayed on screen
PDF and Excel files are downloaded to the user's default download location
Report generation is logged in the system audit trail
User remains on the risk report module page
Filters remain applied for subsequent report generations

testCases.title: Verify scheduling of automated report generation
preconditions: User is logged in as a Risk Analyst with scheduling permissions
Risk report module is accessible and functional
System scheduler service is running and operational
Email delivery service is configured and functional
Test data exists in ApplicantRiskFactors table

steps.action: Navigate to the risk report module
steps.expectedResult: Risk report module page loads successfully

steps.action: Click on 'Schedule Report' or 'Automated Reports' button
steps.expectedResult: Schedule configuration dialog or page opens displaying scheduling options

steps.action: Enter report name as 'Weekly Risk Summary'
steps.expectedResult: Report name is entered and displayed in the name field

steps.action: Select report filters: date range (Last 7 days), risk level (All), status (Active)
steps.expectedResult: Selected filters are displayed in the schedule configuration

steps.action: Set recurrence pattern to 'Weekly' and select day as 'Monday'
steps.expectedResult: Recurrence pattern is set and displayed as 'Every Monday'

steps.action: Set time for report generation as '08:00 AM'
steps.expectedResult: Time is set and displayed as '08:00 AM'

steps.action: Select export format as 'PDF and Excel'
steps.expectedResult: Both PDF and Excel formats are selected and indicated

steps.action: Enter delivery email address in the recipient field
steps.expectedResult: Email address is entered and validated as correct format

steps.action: Click 'Save Schedule' or 'Create Schedule' button
steps.expectedResult: System saves the schedule and displays success confirmation message with schedule ID

steps.action: Verify the scheduled report appears in the list of automated reports
steps.expectedResult: Scheduled report 'Weekly Risk Summary' is listed with correct recurrence pattern, time, and status as 'Active'

steps.action: Wait for or simulate the scheduled time (Monday 08:00 AM) to trigger report generation
steps.expectedResult: System automatically generates the report at the scheduled time

steps.action: Check the scheduled reports execution log or history
steps.expectedResult: Log shows successful execution with timestamp matching the scheduled time

steps.action: Verify email delivery by checking the recipient inbox
steps.expectedResult: Email is received with subject containing report name, and attachments include both PDF and Excel files with correct data

postconditions: Automated report schedule is saved and active in the system
Schedule appears in the list of automated reports
Report is generated and delivered at the scheduled time
Execution is logged in the system audit trail
Email with report attachments is delivered to specified recipients

testCases.title: Test access control for risk reports
preconditions: System has role-based access control configured
Test user accounts exist: one with Risk Analyst role and one without (e.g., General User or Applicant role)
Risk report module is functional and accessible via direct URL
ApplicantRiskFactors table contains test data
Authentication and authorization services are operational

steps.action: Logout from any existing session to ensure clean test state
steps.expectedResult: User is logged out and redirected to login page

steps.action: Login with unauthorized user credentials (username: 'testuser', role: General User)
steps.expectedResult: Login successful and user is redirected to their authorized dashboard

steps.action: Attempt to navigate to risk report module via menu or navigation
steps.expectedResult: Risk report module option is not visible in the navigation menu

steps.action: Attempt to access risk report module directly by entering the URL '/api/reports/riskfactors' or report page URL
steps.expectedResult: Access is denied with HTTP 403 Forbidden status or appropriate error page displaying message 'Access Denied: You do not have permission to view risk reports'

steps.action: Verify that no report data is displayed or accessible
steps.expectedResult: No sensitive risk report data is exposed; user sees only the access denied message

steps.action: Verify error is logged in the system security audit log
steps.expectedResult: Unauthorized access attempt is logged with user ID, timestamp, and attempted resource

steps.action: Logout from the unauthorized user account
steps.expectedResult: User is logged out successfully and redirected to login page

steps.action: Login with Risk Analyst credentials (username: 'riskanalyst01', role: Risk Analyst)
steps.expectedResult: Login successful and user is redirected to Risk Analyst dashboard

steps.action: Navigate to risk report module via menu or navigation
steps.expectedResult: Risk report module option is visible and accessible in the navigation menu

steps.action: Click on risk report module link
steps.expectedResult: Risk report module page loads successfully displaying filter options and report generation interface

steps.action: Generate a sample risk report without applying any filters
steps.expectedResult: Report is generated successfully within 5 seconds and displays risk factor data

steps.action: Verify all report features are accessible (filters, export, scheduling)
steps.expectedResult: All features are visible and functional for the Risk Analyst user

postconditions: Unauthorized user access attempt is denied and logged
No sensitive data is exposed to unauthorized users
Risk Analyst user successfully accesses and uses risk report module
Security audit log contains records of both access attempts
System maintains proper role-based access control integrity
